bib.title: Community evolution in dynamic multi-mode networks
bib.author: Tang, Lei and Liu, Huan and Zhang, Jianping and Nazeri, Zohreh
bib.abstract: A multi-mode network typically consists of multiple heterogeneous social actors among which various types of interactions could occur. Identifying communities in a multi-mode network can help understand the structural properties of the network, address the data
bib.booktitle: Proceedings of the 14th ACM SIGKDD international conference on Knowledge discovery and data mining
